plans.name: Explore Colosseum
plans.description: Visit the iconic Colosseum in Rome and explore its rich history.

plans.name: Guided Tour of Rome
plans.description: Discover the beauty of Rome with a knowledgeable local guide.

plans.name: Eiffel Tower Experience
plans.description: Ascend the iconic Eiffel Tower and enjoy breathtaking views of Paris.

plans.name: Wine Tasting in Bordeaux
plans.description: Indulge in a luxurious wine tasting experience in the renowned Bordeaux region.

plans.name: Visit Kyoto Temples
plans.description: Explore the ancient temples of Kyoto and experience Japanese culture.

plans.name: Tokyo City Tour
plans.description: Discover the vibrant city of Tokyo with a guided tour of its famous landmarks.

plans.name: Great Barrier Reef Snorkeling
plans.description: Explore the stunning underwater world of the Great Barrier Reef with a snorkeling adventure.

plans.name: Sydney Opera House Tour
plans.description: Take a guided tour of the iconic Sydney Opera House and learn about its architecture and history.

plans.name: Bangkok City Tour
plans.description: Experience the bustling city of Bangkok with a guided tour of its temples and markets.

plans.name: Phi Phi Islands Cruise
plans.description: Sail through the crystal-clear waters of the Phi Phi Islands and relax on pristine beaches.

plans.name: Grand Canyon Helicopter Tour
plans.description: Soar above the majestic Grand Canyon in a thrilling helicopter tour.

plans.name: New York City Broadway Show
plans.description: Experience the magic of Broadway with tickets to a popular show in New York City.
